bio: This Yo-kai will make even nice people into scheming manipulators. An embodiment of Pinkipoo's bad side.

soultimate.name: Twisted Love
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Heals allies at a rate of 15% every 2 seconds for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies slowly recover HP.

skill.effect: 10% Atk 70% Def 8% Spd 20% MM ↑ when Inspirited ↓.
skill.name: Cursed Skin

name: Pookivil
